metadata.title: CVE-2024-37674 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Cross Site Scripting vulnerability in Moodle CMS v3.10 allows a remoteattacker to execute arbitrary code via the Field Name (name parameter) of anew activity.

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
